attributes.action: to compel Fenland District Council to provide Chatteris with leisure facilities to equal those enjoyed by the other Fenland Market Towns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The three other Fenland Market Towns (March, Whittlesea and Wisbech) all benefit from leisure centres with swimming pools. Fenland District Council, the designated leisure provider, appears to have no interest or desire in providing similar facilities in its other Market Town, Chatteris. The residents of Chatteris contribute towards the running costs of the other Fenland leisure centres, a situation which we believe is unfair and iniquitous.
